Hard AP2 disconnect (Shift - D for soft disconnect)

Cancel glideslope warning or self test GPWS
Left click to apply reverse throttle, mmb to cancel

Enable ADF Beat Frequency Oscillator to hear ADF ident

animation.action:
0 false
systems/electrical/bus/dc-hot-1 25
property-assign controls/electrical/switches/emer-elec-man-on 1
nasal libraries.pushbutton(); =
property-assign controls/electrical/switches/emer-elec-man-on 0

PropertyList.animation:
knob XbleedKnb> XbleedKnb.mark controls/pneumatics/switches/x-bleed-pos 15 -50 50
XbleedKnb.axis
property-cycle controls/pneumatics/switches/x-bleed 0 1 2 false
nasal setprop("sim/sound/knb1", 1);
/options/system/toggle-tooltips
set-tooltip xbleed-lbl Crossbleed valve control

binding.label: Switch AC ESS power to AC2

Turn off avionics cooling blower fan (INOP)
Turn off avionics cooling extract fan (INOP)
